name: toAsyncIterableRuntime
signature: { <A, XR>(runtime: Runtime<XR>): <E, R extends XR>(self: Stream<A, E, R>) => AsyncIterable<A>; <A, E, XR, R extends XR>(self: Stream<A, E, R>, runtime: Runtime<XR>): AsyncIterable<A>; }
